TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NQIdZ:ref

Hi Team,

I've opened this ticket on behalf of the Australian Criminal Intelligence Commission, due to issues receiving the automated access email to the Netwrix support portal.

I am including Sinisa from the customer side as the primary point of contact for this ticket.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist with.

Regards,
Matt Harris
Account Manager

Direct: +61 8 8166 2811
Mobile: +61432 484 168

TextBody:
Hello,

Before updating, please be sure to create a VM snapshot to have a safe point.

Please be sure to upload only one patch and wait for it to finish installing before uploading the next.
To update the server, please apply the below patch to the server from "Device Control > Live Update > Offline Patch Uploader".
Upload it and wait 5 to 10 minutes, then refresh the webpage to see the version in the lower right corner.
Once the first patch is finished, you can apply the next patch.
After it is updated, you can download the new Epp client.

Epp 5.9.3.0 to Epp 5.9.4.0
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP00656940.tar.gz  
Epp 5.9.4.0 to Epp 5.9.4.1
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500665941.tar.gz

On the Epp server, is any device set to block?
Can you try to allow all devices to see if the issue remains?

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NQIdZ:ref

OFFICIAL

Thanks Matt and Andrei,

Whilst we still have a little more testing to do I can confirm that the upgrade appears to have fixed our initial problem.  The virtual hard drives presented to our VMs are no longer being restricted under the latest EPP client.

Thank you for everyone's assistance, I am happy for this support request to be closed.  We will reach out again if we encounter any further issues.

Regards



[Australian Criminal Intelligence Commission]
Sinisa Vulic
Australian Criminal Intelligence Commission | Ngunnawal Country
Sinisa.Vulic@acic.gov.au<mailto:Sinisa.Vulic@acic.gov.au> |+61 2 6268 7228
